name: Github Bot
description: A bot to manage open source projects on GitHub

BOT_USERNAME.description: Your app's github username. Used for accepting commands.

BASE64_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Base64 encoded string of your app's private key

BOT_ID.description: The integer ID of your bot from your app's settings page

GITHUB_SECRET.description: The secret added by you during your app's configuration on Github

NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION.description: DO NOT EDIT. This value needs to be false for all the required node deps to be downloaded.
